titles.title: Unclaimed Veterans Burial Benefit Correction Act of 2020
Unclaimed Veterans Burial Benefit Correction Act of 2020

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to pay costs relating to the transportation of certain deceased veterans to certain State and tribal veterans' cemeteries, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary:
Unclaimed Veterans Burial Benefit Correction Act of 2020
This bill authorizes the Department of Veterans Affairs to pay costs related to the transportation of certain deceased veterans to veterans' cemeteries owned by a state or tribal organization.
